docs.text: Welcome to the Indigon Docs Note: This documentation is a work in progress. Welcome to Indigon Bending's documentation, replete with guides for the RPG server and (almost) everything you need to know! Our main community hubs are our Discord and our Forums .
docs.title: Welcome to the Indigon Docs
